sourcesContent:
const Invoice = ({showSingleTask})=>{ return <>

Invoice

From
Writers
To
Rodgers Ogada
Email: ogadarodgers@gmail.com
Date: October 16, 2021

Invoice Details:

Order # Order Name Title Status Date Completed Pay per page Pages Amount
123 123 123 123 123 123 123 123
Total: 0 Ksh
} export default Invoice;
